amendment.description: Amendment redirects funds toward removal of the lookout posts that have been established along the U.S.-Mexico border.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 111-183 to reduce and then increase funding for United States Customs and Border Protection salaries and expenses by $1 million. This funding would go towards removing the lookout posts that have been established along the U.S.-Mexico border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 187, 1 Present (Roll no. 439).
